name: i didn't think the future would be this way
name_original: i didn't think the future would be this way
description:
IDTTFWBLT is a simulated environment and estranged landscape. Built using Unity3D, particle systems, and Blender .obj models, it constructs a contradictory form - a game worked against itself, emptied of signifiers and yet alluding to a shuddering and chaotic future.

Built between April - September 2017.

Movement is restricted to 

U + D + L + R

Mouse
